Package: com.budjb.jaxrs.security

[Groovy] Class JaxrsAnnotationFilterInvocationDefinition

        • com.budjb.jaxrs.security.JaxrsAnnotationFilterInvocationDefinition

        • Annotation-based object definition source. Based on the Grails Spring Security version, but adapted for use with JaxRS resources.
